ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure
Class TileAdapter

java.lang.Object
  BaseAdapter
      ca.ualberta.CMPUT301F13T02.chooseyouradventure.TileAdapter

public class TileAdapter
extends BaseAdapter

This is the Adapter class for Tiles that allows them to be displayed in list-views. The TileAdapter aggregates Tiles and is responsible for generating the views to visualize a tile.

Constructor Summary
